Name: Steam Marines 2
About the game: Steam Marines 2 brings you to distant star systems and planetoids square in the path of conflict between the Tor alien race and the banner of sentient machines. Build your crew of marines to deactivate the station shields and take it from enemy hands. Permadeath - take care of your marines or die trying. Turn-based combat - master movement and fire tactics. Procedural generation - ship interiors and planetside levels. Factions - human, alien, and robot units with their own gear and tactics. Customization - marines with names, portraits, and gear.
